item.title: PHP - AWS Raw API connections
item.description:
PHP - AWS Raw API connections

Authentication

The raw connections to the AWS API with PHP can be a bit tricky sometimes to get the right values. It is very sensitive and the slightest mistake can give you an authentication or signature error. In this post I share code for the main connection methods. They have been minimized to only the necessary code so they are easy to understand and implement into your own application. Most services use very similar code so most of the below you can put into functions for repeat use between services.
